main event: A school teacher in Amarillo, Texas reported seeing a white light-emitting object with a flat front and a trailing tail in the sky for about 20 seconds on July 7, 1966.
interesting points: The object had a flat front and appeared to have a tail that trailed out and diminished.
The object was described as being the size of a basketball and emitting a white light.
The witness had previously reported seeing other similar objects on two occasions but had not reported them before.
The local TV station, KGNC, had received one other call regarding the sighting.
The investigation revealed no other craft were in the area at the time of the sighting.
sighted object: A white light-emitting object with a flat front and a trailing tail
